title: Handy Man
summary: A user friendly app that connects users to nearby businesses and tradesmen. Imagine doordash but with skilled tradesmen instead of food.

title: Nostalgia Generator
summary: The Nostalgia Generator is a Javascript-based web application that allows users to search for all media for a given year. They are able to broswe through titles in a simple set of carousels, choosing between learning more about titles of interst or saving interesting titles for later review in their personal List.
